reflex-basic-host provides a basic Reflex host for backend work. It provides instances for most of the important Reflex typeclasses.
@Reflex.Host.Basic.basicHostWithQuit@ is the main entry point for running FRP code. Use the @TriggerEvent@ instance to construct @Event@s and control when they fire, and use the @PerformEvent@ instance to take actions in response to @Event@ firings.
